session_notes: First session focused on getting to know Sarah's background and current artistic challenges. Discussed her cultural heritage and how it influences her work.
goals_discussed: Explore personal narrative, Identify core themes, Develop artistic voice
progress_made: Sarah opened up about her background and we identified key themes to explore in her work.
next_steps: Create mood board of visual inspirations, Start sketching initial concepts, Read 'The Artist's Way' chapters 1-3
challenges_faced: Feeling overwhelmed by the scope of cultural identity themes
resources_shared: Recommended 'The Artist's Way' by Julia Cameron, Shared examples of artists exploring similar themes
artist_feedback: Really helpful first session! Emma made me feel comfortable sharing my background.
volunteer_feedback: Sarah is very engaged and has great potential. Looking forward to seeing her progress.

session_notes: Second session reviewed Sarah's mood board and initial sketches. Provided feedback on concept development.
goals_discussed: Refine core themes, Develop visual language, Create first pieces in series
progress_made: Sarah created an excellent mood board and has 3 strong sketches to develop further.
next_steps: Develop 2-3 sketches into finished pieces, Experiment with color palettes, Research gallery opportunities
challenges_faced: Struggling with color choices that feel authentic to her cultural background
resources_shared: Color theory resources, Examples of cultural color usage in contemporary art
